mapper.select: select t_date from t_sim_trade_date where is_trade = '0'

insert.foreach: insert into t_sim_industry( market_id, stock_code, industry_code, industry_name ) values ( #{industry.marketId}, #{industry.stockCode}, #{industry.industryCode}, #{industry.industryName} )

insert into t_sim_exponent( market_id, stock_code, stock_name, exponent, create_date, exponent_dynamic, yesterday ) values ( #{stock.marketId}, #{stock.stockCode}, #{stock.stockName}, #{stock.nowPrice}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'), #{stock.dayPercentage}, #{stock.yesterday} ) on duplicate key update exponent = #{stock.nowPrice},exponent_dynamic = #{stock.dayPercentage}
